verses.verse: Why standest <WH5975> thou afar off <WH7350>, O Jehovah <WH3068>? Why hidest <WH5956> thou thyself in times <WH6256> of trouble <WH6869>?
In the pride <WH1346> of the wicked <WH7563> the poor <WH6041> is hotly pursued <WH1814>; Let them be taken <WH8610> in the devices <WH4209> that <WH2098> they have conceived <WH2803>.
For the wicked <WH7563> boasteth <WH1984> of his heart <WH5315>'s desire <WH8378>, And the covetous <WH1214> renounceth <WH1288>, yea <WH5006>, contemneth Jehovah <WH3068>.
The wicked <WH7563>, in the pride <WH1363> of his countenance <WH639>, saith <WH1875>, He will not require it <WH4209>. All his thoughts are <WH430>, There is no God.
His ways <WH1870> are firm <WH2342> at all times <WH6256>; Thy judgments <WH4941> are far above <WH4791> out of his sight <WH6887>: As for all his adversaries, he puffeth at them <WH6315>.
He saith <WH559> in his heart <WH3820>, I shall not be moved <WH4131>; To all generations <WH1755> I shall not be in adversity <WH7451>.
His mouth <WH6310> is full <WH4390> of cursing <WH423> and deceit <WH4820> and oppression <WH8496>: Under his tongue <WH3956> is mischief <WH5999> and iniquity <WH205>.

He sitteth <WH3427> in the lurking-places <WH3993> of the villages <WH2691>; In the secret places <WH3993> doth he murder <WH2026> the innocent <WH5355>; His eyes <WH5869> are privily set <WH6845> against the helpless <WH2489>.

He lurketh <WH693> in secret <WH4565> as a lion <WH738> in his covert <WH5520>; He lieth in wait <WH693> to catch <WH2414> the poor <WH6041>: He doth catch <WH2414> the poor <WH6041>, when he draweth <WH4900> him in his net <WH7568>.
He croucheth <WH1794>, he boweth <WH7817> down <WH2489>, And the helpless fall <WH5307> by his strong ones <WH6099>.
He saith <WH559> in his heart <WH3820>, God <WH410> hath forgotten <WH7911>; He hideth <WH5641> his face <WH6440>; he will never <WH5331> see it <WH7200>.
Arise <WH6965>, O Jehovah <WH3068>; O God <WH410>, lift up <WH5375> thy hand <WH3027>: Forget <WH7911> not the poor <WH6035>.
Wherefore doth the wicked <WH7563> contemn <WH5006> God <WH430>, And say <WH559> in his heart <WH3820>, Thou wilt not require it <WH1875>?

Thou hast seen <WH7200> it <WH5027>; for thou beholdest mischief <WH5999> and spite <WH3708>, to requite <WH5414> it with thy hand <WH3027>: The helpless <WH2489> committeth <WH5800> himself unto thee <WH5826>; Thou hast been the helper of the fatherless <WH3490>.
Break <WH7665> thou the arm <WH2220> of the wicked <WH7563>; And as for the evil <WH7451> man <WH1875>, seek out his wickedness <WH7562> till thou find <WH4672> none <WH1077>.
Jehovah <WH3068> is King <WH4428> for ever <WH5769> and ever <WH5769>: The nations <WH1471> are perished <WH6> out of his land <WH776>.
Jehovah <WH3068>, thou hast heard <WH8085> the desire <WH8378> of the meek <WH6035>: Thou wilt prepare <WH3559> their heart <WH3820>, thou wilt cause thine ear <WH241> to hear <WH7181>;
To judge <WH8199> the fatherless <WH3490> and the oppressed <WH1790>, That man <WH582> who is of the earth <WH776> may be terrible <WH6206> no more <WH3254>.
